originalPrerequisite: High-school calculus and a score of 80% or higher in BC Principles of Mathematics 12 or Pre-calculus 12.
blacklistReason: The prerequisite 'High-school calculus' cannot be represented unambiguously using the provided type system.  There is no way to specify 'High-school calculus' as a specific course or credit within the defined types.  The type system lacks the ability to handle prerequisites outside of UBC courses or credit requirements.
